title: I can't launch my lol launcher
body: I can't launch my lol launcher whenever I double click it nothing happens. I tried reinstalling it 3 times but it still didn't work. Can someone pls help me. I'm on a mac.

replies.body: i go on my lol and it pops up put nothing pops up just black and says league of legends and riot games help me
Yeah i'm having the same problem tooooooo. Need help.
Yeah i'm having this problem as well, i'm also on a Mac.
I'm having the exact same problem. Also on a Mac. I've reinstalled and restarted so many times it's become monotonous. Some help would be wonderful please.
